item.title: Arch Conf in October
item.description: Fellow Archers! We are happy to announce, that we will be hosting a community-centric (developers, trusted users and support staff) event in October (the weekend of the 5th and 6th to be exact) this year. For more information, see the about page. Arch Conf will happen at Native Space (the community space of Native Instruments GmbH). For details on the exact location and how to get there, please check out the travel page.
